posts.name: Rajat Shenoi
posts.cooked:
To all who are saying that the CSV file format seems correct and blaming it on the portal. Please note, if you’re sure that the CSV file format is correct, then atleast one of your answers is actually wrong.

Now that the deadline has passed, if you go to the private cases tab, you should see the number of answers that are wrong (Ex: “Your submission has 2 answers wrong”). It still won’t say which one is actually wrong.

posts.name: Potakamuri Venkata Manisai
posts.cooked:
1. This is what the portal instructions say.

Screenshot 2024-08-26 at 8.24.53 AM1992×350 51.7 KB

  1. Nothing mentioned regarding actual answers being wrong in the following instructions too.

Screenshot 2024-08-26 at 8.23.40 AM1480×404 36.7 KB

  1. My score shows 100 which means no wrong answers I guess.

Screenshot 2024-08-26 at 8.28.14 AM1866×248 23 KB

Acknowledgement is the 1st step towards any solution. I feel like I’m using a government portal but not something from India’s top tech institute.

posts.name: Meghraj Kalase
posts.cooked:
At the end of the first screen shot, there is an alert “Your submission has wrong answers. Please recheck the submission”. This means, even though format wise your submission was correct but some of the answers are not correct.

For point(3), go to project2 section, click on “Testcases” tab and then “Private Tests”. you will see something similar to below message:

Your submission has num wrong answers.

I guess, number of wrong answers will decide your overall score.

posts.name: Zoya Hasan
posts.cooked:
This is to inform you that I ZOYA HASAN , a student of BS DATA SCIENCE (Diploma in DATA SCIENCE) is facing an issue in the submission of Project-2 of Tools in Data Science .

  • 1st, choose the csv file of utf-8 format .

  • Then, I clicked on " test run". Test run is showing that "The question number in csv does not match with the questions given in the portal { Q4} , The row 1 with Q4 is incorrect " even though my answer format is as per the instructions.

  • Secondly , there is an issue in the submission of the assignment. When I click on the submit button , the page is just loading and loading and not submitting.

I also mailed but no action has been taken.

I have attached my answer sheet

Screenshot 2024-08-27 232952742×780 25 KB

Kindly accept my answers or do the needful at the earliest possible.

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
Hi Zoya,

Please see this post.

Official Announcement: Housekeeping Tools in Data Science
1. Project submissions which were in the wrong index order, i.e. you did not follow the rule regarding order of questions: Resolution: We will consider all submissions of questions in any order. If you have answered the question correctly we will award you the marks regardless of the order in which you submitted the questions. 2. Test run submitted, but the CSV was not submitted: Resolution: We will consider your test submission if you were not able to submit the csv normally. You will get an …

Kind regards
